elements: Just what you need to refresh your knowledge of Latin.
Alexander LaCroix spent years in secret study of the tablets taken from the Fucine Marshes in central Italy. His work will allow you to decipher Fucine texts.
Kühner and Gerth's 'Ausführliche Grammatik der griechischen Sprache'
An essential weapon for a ferocious struggle with a challenging language.

An elaborate ivory sculpture of impossible intricacy. Around and across its surfaces, Sanskrit inscriptions spiral against matching lines of Vak. [If you speak Sanskrit, you can use this to learn Vak, the first language of the world.]
